text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Shaka shaa~ka, delicious stir-fried veggies♪
A heaping~ bowl of rice is over there~♪

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Gulp down the miso soup~...♪
Gulp...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Huh, what was it again?
Gulp oooh...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
What should I do, I can't remember!
I even made a "Set Meal Song"~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ugh~~ I'm so frustrated!
Does anyone know the rest~!?
In the end, Matikanetannhauser kept feeling frustrated, unable to recall the lyrics...
